content_blocks.title: Chain of Custody

content.text: This lesson covers Evidence tracking, Documentation, Legal requirements, Integrity. You'll learn the fundamentals and practical applications.

content_blocks.simplified_explanation: Think of this like Evidence tracking in everyday life...
content_blocks.real_world_connection: In real-world scenarios, Evidence tracking is used daily by security professionals.
content_blocks.reflection_prompt: What questions do you have about this topic?

post_assessment.question: Why is chain of custody critical?
post_assessment.explanation: Chain of custody ensures evidence is legally admissible by proving it wasn't tampered with.
